chrome-extension-bookmarks-on-new-tab.desc: Chrome extension makes new tab extremely lightweight page with bookmarks access

chrome-extension-radio-paradise.desc: [no-longer-supported] Chrome extension to listen to Radio Paradise online

chrome-extension-tab-gatherer.desc: Chrome extension to group tabs for you automatically

chrome-extension-timestamp-to-readable.desc: Chrome extension to make UNIX timestamps on Web pages readable

chrome-extension-url-to-qrcode.desc: [no-longer-supported] Google Chrome extension to generate QR-code with URL of current opened page

cnbot.desc: The tool to build your custom Telegram bot easier than ever

conways-game-of-life.desc: Fast Conway's Game of Life in JavaScript and canvas

dragon-on-wheels.desc: Simple pure Python SCGI/WSGI threaded server

fairseabattle.desc: Sea Battle game, based on AI only

fast-online-mandelbrot-set-explorer.desc: Fast WebGL online Mandelbrot/Julia sets explorer

hexglass.desc: Tetris like puzzle game on the hexagonal board

human-readable-json-logging.desc: The tool to pretty print JSON log stream right from running process in human readable format

milisp.desc: Multiple implementations (Golang and Python) of LISP-like language to share the same ML pipeline over many systems

netpunch.desc: Netpunch is a tool to establish network connections between nodes which are behind NATs and firewalls

playwindow.desc: Easy-to-use graphics library for very simple programming graphics in synchronous manner

scato.desc: [googlecode] Turtle graphics programming language with GUI, guides and examples

ska.desc: [googlecode] Cryptography library without restrictions to combine block ciphers and modes of operation

systemd-env-file.desc: Go package to read files in systemd EnvironmentFile format, and CLI utility to source environment variables from EnvironmentFile-formatted file

telegram-bot-for-system-monitoring.desc: Telegram bot for system monitoring and administration

unote.desc: Simple standalone GUI notification utility with simple network API

xterm256-color-picker.desc: Online color picker for terminal 256 color palette. Examples for shell prompt, vim, term/xterm
